imagingelement: 1/1.7-inch square pixel color CCD (total pixels: 12.39 million)
recordingmedia: Built-in flash memory (image area: 11.4MB), SDHC Memory Card / SD Memory Card / Multimedia Card / Multimedia Card plus compatible
